title: Tran - male dixisti mihi - Phaedrus Fabulae 1 1

content.description:
“Ante hos duos menses male,” ait “dixisti mihi.” 
Respondit canis, “Equidem natus non eram.”
content.question: In the passage, male dixisti mihi is translated

choices.label: I prefer that you have spoken

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
